title: Natsik hunting
creator_credit: ONF | NFB, Wolf Koenig, Peter Raymont and Mosha Michael
brief_description: Natsik Hunting is the story of a seal hunt. It is also the first live-action film shot and directed by an Inuk. Initial shot by 25 year-old Mosha Michael on Super 8mm and converted to 16mm by NFBC.
creator_credit_for_label: ONF | NFB, Wolf Koenig, Peter Raymont and Mosha Michael
description: Natsik Hunting is the story of a seal hunt. It is also the first live-action film shot and directed by an Inuk. Initial shot by 25 year-old Mosha Michael on Super 8mm and converted to 16mm by NFBC.
